Project Team

Pricipal Investigator

The Su≈õruta Project is led by Prof. Dominik Wujastyk, Singhmar Chair in Classical Indian Society and Polity at the University of Alberta. Prof. Wujastyk has a track record of research and publication in the study of Indian manuscripts, the history of Indian medicine (ayurveda) and other disciplines in Sanskrit and Indological studies.
